page.title: 10Chard Industry 1
page.content: There is very little industry in the major part of the block,as most of the land is devoted to agriculture . That which exists is mainly confined to the edge of Chard included in just one of the sub sections. In 1985 the oldest factory buildings are occupied by{a company who repair{Ministry of Defence equipment, primarily for the RAF. Their buildings date from 1842 when the firm of Robert Dening made iron castings for a wide variety of farm equipment which can still be seen on farms in Southern England .The site is soon to be developed as part of the North Glynswood housing estate and the business will then close. {Eagle Plant}hire heavy machinery for road construction including fork lift trucks and road-rollers and compressors.
